name: Im Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius
author: 한명현
content: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious &#40?&#41 friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...
